Events that occurred on 25 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1939 - Actor Ian McKellen is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 71.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 271.
1968 - "In the Footsteps of the Hobbits", an interview with Tolkien, is published in the Birmingham Post.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 337.
2004 - The theatrical edition of The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King is released on DVD.
2023 - The Lord of the Rings: Gollum is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
